name: Salomon OUTline Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Women's
categories: OUTline Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes
description: Make happy hiking memories in durable, ultra-comfortable waterproof trail shoes. Constructed for a precise, foot-hugging fit, the OUTline is lightweight enough for all-day excursions. The seamless upper offers sneaker-like comfort. The GORE-TEX® membrane says no to water and yes to breathability. Welded overlays and a toecap resist scrapes, while a gusseted tongue keeps dirt and sand out.Seamless synthetic uppers have welded overlays for durability.Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® booties let you tackle wet conditions.Protective synthetic toe cap adds toe protection.Sensifit™ construction provides a precise, secure fit.Gusseted tongues keep debris out.Removable OrthoLite® EVA footbeds cushion feet for long days on the trail.Injected EVA midsoles make 15km hikes feel like 5km.Outsoles are non-marking Contagrip® rubber.5mm lugs provide traction over a variety of directions and surfaces.
